text: The order of the [[Dragon's Path]] within House [[Thuranni]] is administered and convened by Viceroy Ureila d'Thuranni, a talented [[wizard]] and master of geometric sigilcraft.
title: Ureilya d'Thuranni
tags: [[Lhazaar Principalities]] Thuranni elf humanoid [[Dragon's Path]] wizard
tooltip: leader of the Dragon's Path organization of House Thuranni
